turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need to schedule a check-up appointment with Dr. Smith.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I can help you with that. Can you please provide your date of birth and the last four digits of your social security number for verification purposes?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, do I really have to? Fine. It's 01/15/1980 and the last four are 1234.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. Please hold while I access your records... Okay, I have your information. Dr. Smith's earliest availability is next Tuesday at 2:00 PM. Would that work for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: No, Tuesdays are terrible for me. Are there any other days that week, like Wednesday or Thursday?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Let me check... Hmm, it looks like Thursday at 10:00 AM is the only other option available that week. If that doesn't work, the next available appointment would be the following Monday.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, that's a bit early, but I'll take Thursday at 10:00 AM. Can you tell me, is there a cancellation policy? And, can I get a summary of the appointment sent to me?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Yes, there is a 24-hour cancellation policy. You'll find it in the email confirmation that will be sent to your provided email address. The appointment details are: Thursday at 10:00 AM with Dr. Smith. Is there anything else?
